extendedInfo.description: The very classic, exciting and addictive fall down game. Tilt your phone to make ball fall down quickly with rhythmic music. Don't let the ball touch ceiling.Support App2sd for Android 2.21.0.2Smaller sizeNew more games - check it periodically via "More" button.

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: fall down I\'m tellin you now if you get this app you won\'t put your phone down unless someone takes it.  its fun! Good luck! And have fun! byTaylor

reviews.title: good but 1 minor problem.
reviews.comment: good game. the only thing I dont like is the fact that the missing object will suddenly go missing for some seconds and then reappears after you have already lost valuable time. I have played other versions of this game from other comps. and didn\'t have this issue.
